content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We hope you've already heard this acronym: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Digital Strategy and Experience Design\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DSED\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"; this is the name of the big department in which you work now.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DSED is 3k+ Globally and is present in the following countries:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":265846,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ba496042-7b7b-49e9-920b-17b3fa79999b/DSED.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ba496042-7b7b-49e9-920b-17b3fa79999b/DSED.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"DSED.PNG\",\"name\":\"DSED.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ba496042-7b7b-49e9-920b-17b3fa79999b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":597.8844827586207},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
